title: Local Government (Appointment of Local Government Administrator) (Kafue Town Council) Order, 2022
content:
4th November, 2022 Statutory Instruments 953
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO. 71 OF 2022
The Local Government Act, 2019
(Act No. 2 of 2019)
The Local Government (Appointment of Local
Government Administrator) (Kafue Town Council)
Order, 2022
IN EXERCISE of the powers contained in section 56 of the Local
Government Act, 2019, the following Order is made:
1. This Order may be cited as the Local Government Title
(Appointment of Local Government Administrator) (Kafue Town
Council) Order, 2022.
2. The person named in the Schedule, being a public officer, Appointment
is appointed as a Local Government Administrator for Kafue Town of Local
Government
Council. Administrator
3. The person appointed as a Local Government Administrator Functions of
Local
under paragraph 2 shall perform the functions of Kafue Town
Government
Council in accordance with the Act. Administrator
4. The Councillors of Kafue Town Council are suspended from Suspension of
Councillors
performing their functions under the Act from the date of publication
of this Order.
Copies of this Statutory Instrument can be obtained from the Government Printer,
P.O. Box 30136, 10101, Lusaka, Price K4.00 each
